quest.name: A Business Proposal
journal:
Eshana is striking a deal with the M tribe.

â€»Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Carry the fragile package to the Miqo'te merchant at the Peering Stones.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Ah, Forename. We're in the midssst of preparing a shipment of goods to the M tribe. Might I trouble you for assistance in their delivery?

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Normally we would deliver them by cart, but the contentsss of the containers are quite fragile.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: We've had no choice but to assemble a band of carriers to sssend them by hand, taking care not to run afoul of the beasts that roam these lands.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Speak with the Resistance guard at the eastern end of the bridge. He will tell you what needs to be carried and to where.

dialogue.name: WATCHER03066
dialogue.text: Eshana sent you to help with moving the goods, did she? Well the help's certainly welcome. We've got plenty of packages but too few hands to carry them.

dialogue.name: WATCHER03066
dialogue.text: Think you could handle the satchel there on top of the boxes?

dialogue.name: WATCHER03066
dialogue.text: You'll be taking it to the Peering Stones. A merchant of the M tribe should be expecting you near the entrance.

dialogue.name: PEDDLER03066
dialogue.text: Excuse me, misssir. Did you happen to come from Castellum Velodyna? I'm expecting a shipment from the Ananta who hold the bridge there, but they've yet to arrive.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Deliver the fragile package to the Miqo'te merchant awaiting you at the specified location at the entrance of the Peering Stones.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You will have two minutes and fifteen seconds to complete the task. Should you fail, return to the starting location and begin anew.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Be wary of attacks from enemies, which will sap your strength.

dialogue.name: WATCHER03066
dialogue.text: If you could deliver that satchel there on top of the crates, you'd be helping us more than you know. A merchant from the M tribe will be waiting for you at the entrance to the Peering Stones.

dialogue.name: PEDDLER03066
dialogue.text: A package from the Ananta? Oh, yes, of course! Pray forgive me, I was expecting a soldier from the Resistance.

dialogue.name: PEDDLER03066
dialogue.text: To be honest I'm surprised they have any merchandise to sell. Nearly everything they have is sent to the soldiers fighting on the front line.

dialogue.name: PEDDLER03066
dialogue.text: To be honest I'm surprised they have any merchandise to sell. Nearly everything they have is sent to Ala Mhigo to help with the restoration.

dialogue.name: PEDDLER03066
dialogue.text: Still, their goldwork and textile goods are quite popular. It's surprisingly easy to reap large profits despite the great sums we pay for their wares.

dialogue.name: PEDDLER03066
dialogue.text: But I've kept you long enough. Once everything is accounted for it's off to the markets with me. When you return to the castellum, pray tell Eshana I will visit soon to thank her personally, as well as deliver their share of our earnings.

dialogue.name: WATCHER03066
dialogue.text: Thanks again for your help, misssir. Now you'll want to take that satchel over to the Peering Stones. A merchant from the M tribe will be waiting for you at the entrance.

dialogue.name: WATCHER03066
dialogue.text: Back, are we? I was afraid this might happen. Well, there's plenty more to carry, so grab another satchel. Do try to be a little more careful with this one, okay?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Deliver the fragile package to the Miqo'te merchant awaiting you at the specified location at the entrance of the Peering Stones.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You will have two minutes and fifteen seconds to complete the task. Should you fail, return to the starting location and begin anew.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Be wary of attacks from enemies, which will sap your strength.

dialogue.name: PEDDLER03066
dialogue.text: A few more boxes and I'll be ready to leave to the markets. When you return to the castellum, pray tell Eshana I will visit soon to thank her personally, as well as deliver their share of the profits.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Ah, you are returned. I trust the shipment was sssafely delivered?

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Thank goodness. I was concerned they might leave without our wares.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Time with the Resissstance has taught us not everything must be done on our own. It can be advantageousss to work with others, all contributing their unique abilities to accomplish a common goal.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Through the M tribe we can sell our wares. And through adventurers sssuch as yourself, we can more easily secure our livelihood.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Thusss can the Gatekeepers afford to focus their efforts on helping others in need. We all have our part to play if we are to ensure a better tomorrow for Ala Mhigo.
